duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare reliable current and forecasting financial reports; ensure that the reported results comply with generally accepted accounting principles or financial reporting standards.
Ensure cash flow is appropriate for the organization’s operations.
Supervise and work alongside all finance personnel.
Manage vendor relationships and maintain relationship with bankers.
Oversee the company’s finance IT system and ensure compliance with the law and company’s policies.
Review and process Payroll, manage general ledger along with Book-keeping team, and oversee AR, AP & cash flow in real-time.
Works with external auditors and provide needed information for the annual audit. Ensures compliance with local, state, and federal government requirements.

education_certification.credential: BSc/BA in Accounting, Finance or relevant field; MSc/MBA is a plus
